embed.description: Chester has a few useful tags and commands you can run in the EssentialsX support channel:

fields.name: ?ess
fields.value: Shows information about EssentialsX as well as useful links.

fields.name: ?breakdown
fields.value: Explains what each EssentialsX module does.

fields.name: ?esshelp
fields.value: Shows how to get support with EssentialsX.

fields.name: ?etl
fields.value: Explains how to change EssentialsX's default language and customise the messages files.

fields.name: ??chathelp
fields.value: Explains how to set up chat formatting with EssentialsX Chat and Vault.

fields.name: /essc <query>
fields.value:
Searches the [commands database](https://essinfo.xeya.me/commands.html) with the given search query.
*Example: `/essc home` shows all commands related to homes.*

fields.name: /essp <query>
fields.value:
Searches the [permissions database](https://essinfo.xeya.me/permissions.html) with the given search query.
*Example: `/essp nick` finds all permissions related to nicknames.*

fields.name: /itemdb <query>
fields.value:
Searches **items.json** with the given query.
*Example: `/itemdb dolphin` finds all items matching "dolphin".*

fields.name: /etl <query>
fields.value:
Searches **messages.properties** with the given query.
*Example: `/etl balancetop` finds all baltop messages.*
